div.bibl: Chicagoer Arbeiter Zeitung, Jan. 16, 1881. ARBEITER HALLE.

body.p: The Polandische Company brought last evening the beloved play to the stage entitled "The Embarrassment of a Married Man." (Ein Ehemann in der Klemme). Following this play the company presented the musical comedy from Moser, "Seaman's Homecoming." (Seemanns Heimkehr.)
Is as much as this was received with enormous applause, the company closed with another musical comedy, "The Educated Cook." ( Eine gebildete Koechin).
In as much as the admission was only 15Â¢ the House, as was expected, was filled to capacity.
